about_the_game:
Welcome to Muffinski

Today our Glorious Leader has declared that we the people can now start our own small businesses. A Glorious day indeed!

You had a dream, a dream to run your own private delivery company, you have an office, and you have one employee. The ever-dedicated Sergei to do all the driving.

With Sergei you can begin your business adventure, while Sergei is out on jobs you have to keep on top of the business by giving him jobs and making sure you keep the bills paid. Oh, did we also mention that our great Glorious Leader has decided that you keep on top of the Government Tax Return paperwork?

Also, there is a movement happening in Muffinski. An outrage against our country and Glorious Leader. A group whose only desire it is to see our wonderful most glorious of all Glorious Leaders brought down. The Muffinski United Freedom Fighters (or MUFF for short) are determined to bring down our government.

Wouldn’t want to work for those guys...

In Sergei and the Tax Return you take control of your new business, using your old but still connected office computer you can give Sergei the jobs he needs to do as well as check the news and buy exciting upgrades, like new seatbelts!

You also have to check the Government Tax Return paperwork from other businesses around Muffinski, you start by checking the name of the business against the CEO name to make sure its correct, but before long you'll be checking which area they are from and what the yearly income and outgoings are.

While all this is going on, the phone will ring every now and then and maybe, just maybe MUFF are looking for help...

highlighted.name: You Completed all of MUFF's Missions!
You Did Enough Jobs And Won a Super Prize!

content_descriptors.notes: No visible gore, nudity or bad language in game. Following game story will result in an attempt to overthrow a government dictator.

About the Game

Welcome to Muffinski

Today our Glorious Leader has declared that we the people can now start our own small businesses. A Glorious day indeed!

You had a dream, a dream to run your own private delivery company, you have an office, and you have one employee. The ever-dedicated Sergei to do all the driving.

With Sergei you can begin your business adventure, while Sergei is out on jobs you have to keep on top of the business by giving him jobs and making sure you keep the bills paid. Oh, did we also mention that our great Glorious Leader has decided that you keep on top of the Government Tax Return paperwork?

Also, there is a movement happening in Muffinski. An outrage against our country and Glorious Leader. A group whose only desire it is to see our wonderful most glorious of all Glorious Leaders brought down. The Muffinski United Freedom Fighters (or MUFF for short) are determined to bring down our government.

Wouldn’t want to work for those guys...

In Sergei and the Tax Return you take control of your new business, using your old but still connected office computer you can give Sergei the jobs he needs to do as well as check the news and buy exciting upgrades, like new seatbelts!

You also have to check the Government Tax Return paperwork from other businesses around Muffinski, you start by checking the name of the business against the CEO name to make sure its correct, but before long you'll be checking which area they are from and what the yearly income and outgoings are.

While all this is going on, the phone will ring every now and then and maybe, just maybe MUFF are looking for help...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any 64 Bit Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX730
  • Storage: 378 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Any 64 Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1060
  • Storage: 378 MB available space

short_description: Sergei and the Tax Return is a small Indie project, it uses a simple design and is mostly text based. At its heart it is a small business / tycoon style game where you delagate work and keep on top of the paperwork.
